entry.string: oc process -f https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sogis/pipelines/simi_v2/api_webgisclient/mapinfo-service/deployment/deploymentconfig.yaml -p NAMESPACE=gdi-integration -p TAG=v2.0.0 -p REPLICAS=1 -p CPU_REQUEST=40m -p CPU_LIMIT=80m -p MEMORY_REQUEST=64Mi -p MEMORY_LIMIT=128Mi | oc apply -n gdi-integration -f- oc rollout latest -n gdi-integration mapinfo-service oc rollout status -n gdi-integration dc mapinfo-service
